scripts.dev: npm run copy:data && npm run build:wasm && vite
scripts.build: npm run copy:data && npm run build:wasm && vite build
scripts.build:wasm: cd wasm && wasm-pack build --target web --out-dir pkg
scripts.build:wasm-test: cd wasm && wasm-pack build --target web --out-dir pkg -- --features testing
scripts.copy:data: mkdir -p public && cp ../economy_log.json public/ || echo 'No economy log found, skipping copy'
